summary: A stranger with a haunted past shows up unannounced at the home of Hollywood's hottest horror director, and is determined to teach him what real horror is all about.
cast: Michael O'Keefe|Olesya Rulin|James Van Patten|David Naughton|Michael A. Newcomer|Madi Goff|Joshua Fardon|Jessie Cantrell|Charleene Closshey|Idrise Wardel|Katy Dolle|Kim Waltrip|Griffin Wade|Wendy Rolfe Evered|Dan Gruenberg|Beth Webster|Jim Casey|Summer De Almeida|Viga Dean|Rodney Einwalter|Jon Estes|Jenel Fontes|Harpo|J-ray|Renae Madore|Miguel Majias|Ramon Ramirez
title: A Thousand Cuts
